page.title: 08LIFESTYLES IN NW NEWBURY
page.content: {EATING OUT}Quite a few families have the occasional meal or snack out,either at Snack Bar,Restaurant or Pub.8 pubs in area offer food midday or during evenings,ordered over the bar.One{B & B hotel}used mainly by reps. {FASHIONS}Majority of 25+ age group conservative in dress and appearance.Young people more concerned with appearance,but not as extreme as peers in larger towns.Some punk hair- styles & fashions evident. {RACING & BETTING}on horses :some interest perhaps due to proximity of racng stables at {Lambourn}&{Newbury {Race Course.} {POP MUSIC}popular with younger people,but some inhabitants involved with {choirs,orchestras,and drama {groups,}all of which are outside the area.
